Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.log

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Commitment
    Represents a commitment that invoking TransactionAppender.append(TransactionToApply, LogAppendEvent) means.
    FlushablePositionAwareChecksumChannel  
    LogFileInformation  
    LogicalTransactionStore
    Accessor of transactions and meta data information about transactions.
    LogVersionBridge
    Provides information and functionality for bridging log file boundaries.
    LogVersionedStoreChannel  
    PositionAwareChannel
    Something that is able to report current position when asked.
    ReadableClosablePositionAwareChecksumChannel  
    ReadableLogChannel  
    TransactionAppender
    Writes batches of transactions, each containing groups of commands to a log that is guaranteed to be recoverable, i.e. consistently readable, in the event of failure.
    TransactionCursor
    IOCursor over CommittedTransactionRepresentation i.e. already committed transactions.
    VersionableLog  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatchingTransactionAppender
    Concurrently appends transactions to the transaction log, while coordinating with the log rotation and forcing the log file in batches for higher throughput in a concurrent scenario.
    DetachedCheckpointLogEntryWriter  
    LogEntryCursor
    IOCursor abstraction on top of a LogEntryReader
    LoggingLogFileMonitor  
    LogHeaderCache  
    LogPosition  
    LogPositionMarker
    Mutable marker that can create immutable LogPosition objects when requested to.
    PhysicalFlushableLogChannel  
    PhysicalLogicalTransactionStore  
    PhysicalLogicalTransactionStore.LogVersionLocator  
    PhysicalLogicalTransactionStore.TransactionPositionLocator  
    PhysicalLogVersionedStoreChannel  
    PhysicalTransactionCursor  
    PhysicalTransactionRepresentation  
    PositionAwarePhysicalFlushableChecksumChannel
    Decorator around a LogVersionedStoreChannel making it expose FlushablePositionAwareChecksumChannel.
    ReadAheadLogChannel
    Basically a sequence of channels seamlessly seen as one.
    ReaderLogVersionBridge
    LogVersionBridge naturally transitioning from one LogVersionedStoreChannel to the next, i.e. to log version with one higher version than the current.
    ReadOnlyTransactionStore
    Used for reading transactions off of file.
    TestLogEntryReader  
    TransactionCommitment  
    TransactionLogWriter  
    TransactionMetadataCache  
    TransactionMetadataCache.TransactionMetadata  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MissingLogDataException
    Merely a super class for any kind of exception about logical log or transaction missing or not found.
    NoSuchTransactionException
